name.en: Chemistry and Applications of Conjugated Polymers
name.ch: 共軛高分子化學與應用

goal.ch: 此課程主要針對具代表性之共軛高分子的合成、性質及其應用(如感測器、有機高分子太陽能電池、發光二極體、與場效電晶體等)進行介紹，希望可透過此課程使大學部學生對於共軛高分子相關之基礎知識、專有英文名詞、廣泛的應用潛力有更深的認識與了解，並啟發其未來從事相關學術研究或產業發展的興趣和想法，此外，本課程將採英文授課，以利學生與國際接軌並強化國際競爭力。
goal.en: This course focuses on the synthesis, properties, and applications of representative conjugated polymers, including sensors, organic polymer solar cells, light-emitting diodes, field-effect transistors, etc. This course aims to give undergraduate students a deeper understanding of the fundamental knowledge of conjugated polymers, related technical terminology in English, and their broad potential applications. We also hope to inspire students‘ interest in pursuing academic research or career development in related fields. Furthermore, the course will be taught in English to facilitate students‘ connection to the international community and enhance their global competitiveness.

outline.ch:
[A]共軛高分子基本理論---共2週
[B]具代表性之共軛高分子的合成與性質---共8週
(B-1) Polyacetylenes (PAs)
(B-2) Poly(phenylenevinylene)s (PPVs)
(B-3) Poly(aryleneethynylene)s (PAEs or PPEs)
(B-4) Polythiophenes (PThs)
(B-5) Polyanilines (PANIs)
(B-6) Poly(2,7-carbazole)s (PC or PCzs)
(B-7) Polyfluorenes (PFs or PFOs)
[C]共軛高分子的應用---共8週
(C-1)感測器(化學、光學、生物)
(C-2)太陽能電池
(C-3)發光二極體
(C-4)電池與超級電容
(C-5)電致與光致變色元件
(C-6)場效電晶體
(C-7)記憶元件
outline.en:
[A] Fundamentals of Conjugated Polymers---2 Weeks
[B] Representative Conjugated Polymers---8 Weeks
(B-1) Polyacetylenes (PAs)
(B-2) Poly(phenylenevinylene)s (PPVs)
(B-3) Poly(aryleneethynylene)s (PAEs or PPEs)
(B-4) Polythiophenes (PThs)
(B-5) Polyanilines (PANIs)
(B-6) Poly(2,7-carbazole)s (PC or PCzs)
(B-7) Polyfluorenes (PFs or PFOs)
[C] Applications of Conjugated Polymers---8 Weeks
(C-1) Sensors (Bio, Chemical and Optical)
(C-2) Photovoltaic Devices
(C-3) Light-emitting Diodes
(C-4) Battery and Super-capacitors
(C-5) Electro- or Photo-chromic Devices
(C-6) Field-effect Transistors
(C-7) Memory Devices
